name: Quick Word Search
description:
A quick word search game I whipped up. There are 36 replayable word searches you can try. Downloadable for PC or Android.

Features

  • 6 categories of word searches
  • 6 puzzles per category
  • Each puzzle is randomized so you can replay them as many times as you like
  • Turn on 'Show Best Times' in the settings to show your best times for each puzzle.

Controls

  • Click and drag on a letter to highlight a word
  • Stop dragging to select a word
  • The game will accept selections started at either the start or the end of a word
